Amanda Toni "Mandy" Loots (a mụrụ 3 Ọgọst 1978 na Gwelo, Rhodesia)   bụ nwanyị na-egwu mmiri Olympic na mba na-ejide ihe ndekọ sitere na South Africa.
Loots gwuru na South Africa na 1996, 2000 na 2008 Olympics

N'agbanyeghị ịbụ onye mba South Africa, ọ meriri asọmpi ASA National British n'ihe karịrị 100 mita nru ububa na medley 400 mita na 1999.  N'egwuregwu All-Africa nke 1999, ọ bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu South Africa kacha mma n'egwuregwu ahụ, wee nweta ihe nrite ọla edo isii. Na Nọvemba 2009, o debere African Record na South African Record na obere oge (25m) 200 ofufe.
